author: elecharny
msg: o The journal thread now stops correctly when the queue has been fully flushed
o Dealing with various case of Journal and File name initialization
o The BTree now uses a path and a filename
o Increased the buffer used to write data on disk to speed up the flush
o Empty the journal when flushing the data instead of deleting it

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5516: Annotations such as @Consume and @Produce now supports a new propert option to read a property on the bean to get the endpoint. They also has a convention over configuration in terms of defaulting property name to look for if not explicit configured.

author: trawick
msg: mpm_event, mpm_worker: Remain active amidst prevalent child process
